Text.Translation: #0{ < PT2S : right now | < PT10S: less than 10 seconds ago | < PT1M: {#.TotalSeconds:N0} seconds ago | < P1D: {#.TotalHours:N2} hours ago | a long time ago }
#0{ < PT2S : lige nu | < PT10S: for mindre end 10 sekunder siden | < PT1M: for {#.TotalSeconds:N0} sekunder siden | < P1D: for {#.TotalHours:N2} timer siden | for længe siden}
